tool.name: Export Genomic Region List to {{name}}
tool.description: Create a list of features within a list of genomic regions and upload it to {{name}}

param.name: featureTypes
param.label: Feature Types
param.help: Select which feature types you are interested in from the supplied regions

param.name: listName
param.label: List Name
param.help: Choose a name for the new list (one will be generated if none is supplied)

param.name: token
param.label: API Key
param.help: Enter your {{name}} API key - if you do not have one you will need to visit the MyMine section at {{name}} first

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**TIP** This tool requires *BED* format.
